channel.title: Flame_
channel.description: Congratulations to him, he will be moderating the server advertisements board. Goodluck!

item.title: Flame_
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Stop messaging me, there is no veteran rank that is based of when you register. If you’ve messaged me asking for one the answer is no because it doesn’t exist. The only other veteran rank is hidden and based on a nomination and vote by other members in the group.

Read full topic

item.title: Flame_
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

We’ve reduced it to if you’ve been here since 2009 you can now PM Mopeman and ask for veteran status! Be quick, only limited spots!

[size=2pt](I’m being sarcastic of course)[/size]

Gonna go ahead and lock this thread since it’s completely derailed.

Read full topic

item.title: Flame_
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:26, topic:521010”][quote author=Rix_ link=topic=639518.msg4310648#msg4310648 date=1370681432]

Wait, there is a rank for veterans? I pretty much outdate 95% of the community ;o

Yes there is, PM Tom or Mopeman to receive it.
[/quote]100% acceptance rate if your account is from 2008 or earlier![/quote]
;o I am going to trust you on this, because I just PM’d them going hi I’ve been here since 2006 can I haz vet status.

Read full topic

item.title: Flame_
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

I’m getting the sense that this has all been sarcasm.

Read full topic

item.title: Flame_
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:68, topic:521010”][quote author=Ambokile link=topic=639518.msg4313812#msg4313812 date=1371146427]

The truth is, all admins have an auto-forward script that sends and messages or e-mails to Mopeman the most helpful admin in the history of moparscape who then judges whether or not you deserve the award based on several factors in your message. If he can’t determine your eligibility for veteran he attempts to hold a conversation with you to gather more information, however as we all know Mopeman is prone to forgetting that there are people on the other side waiting for his response and he comes back a few hours after the last message acting as if the conversation had never even took place.

Oh, it’s Mopman? I thought it was a script because I got a pretty quick reply telling me that my score wasn’t high enough.
[/quote]to be fair you did register only just last year ( according to that account )

I bet I wouldn’t even get a high enough score.[/quote]

I included a lot of the words necessary though, such as “perfect compiler”. You should shoot a PM over and have a go.

Read full topic

item.title: Flame_
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Svitkona, post:64, topic:521010”]The truth is, all admins have an auto-forward script that sends and messages or e-mails to Mopeman the most helpful admin in the history of moparscape who then judges whether or not you deserve the award based on several factors in your message. If he can’t determine your eligibility for veteran he attempts to hold a conversation with you to gather more information, however as we all know Mopeman is prone to forgetting that there are people on the other side waiting for his response and he comes back a few hours after the last message acting as if the conversation had never even took place.[/quote]So really if I am gathering this information properly…

  1. We send a message to Tom…who then auto sends it to Mopman.
  2. The message itself needs to be about “why” we should have a veteran rank
  3. babymaking skill
  4. profit??

item.title: Flame_
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:62, topic:521010”][quote author=Ambokile link=topic=639518.msg4313771#msg4313771 date=1371142628]

I thought to be a vet you had to be here since like 07?

I don’t think so, you just have to send a PM to one of their admins and they run your PM through a script which scores you. If your score is above a certain amount then they make you a vet.
[/quote]how does a pm determine if you are a vet? o_0[/quote]Yeah. I thought this whole thing was a joke until I started seeing people get all serious about it. What exactly do you have to do? Because the system seems flawed here.

Read full topic

[/quote]

Don’t rush it. I’m an old member since I’ve been here all summer, I only barely scraped it.[/quote]

I think Rash is an old member and he commented about the words… did you apply Rash?

item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:51, topic:521010”][quote author=Phaze One link=topic=639518.msg4312058#msg4312058 date=1370894071]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=639518.msg4311956#msg4311956 date=1370886486]

Another mod is made, and its not me yet. Maybe one day…Maybe one day…

Congrats~

Some people aren’t fit to become a mod. I would most likely be somewhat biased based on nationality.

I highly doubt cultural differences and nationality play a part in the nomination process.
[/quote]hmm well don’t be so sure. Think about it you want a team from all over the world to cover most timezones. We already have several moderators from the European side. If anything we need an aussie mod. looks at amy

australians are morons anyway
[/quote]don’t about my Amy like that! :mad:[/quote]
@Loveandpower: Shes Mine
@Krackkid: Don’t discriminate other human races bro, not cool :s
